content:
My investment thesis for now:
- Sold SLP
- Bought YFI
- SLP will depreciate after its jumps
- YFI will double to 60K
- I'll sell YFI and buy SLP, that will surpass its ATH
- Will re-balance by 4-tokens portfolio

Its not investment advice. Posted offline. Online only when this gets outdated. 2/24/21 16:25
